0: Charcoal made by heating wood in a kiln, or a lump of charcoal.
A black mass left after a thing is burnt.
(figurative) An anxious and pitiful state of mind.

1: 숯 굽는 일을 하는 사람을 낮잡아 이르는 말.
나무를 숯가마에 넣어 구워 낸 검은 덩어리의 연료.

0: A black lump produced by placing and heating wood in the kiln that is used to start a fire.
A black lump left after something has been burnt up.
